properties.name: Dau Pagoda (Chua Dau)
properties.description: Oldest Buddhist pagoda in Vietnam, built in the 2nd century.

properties.name: But Thap Pagoda
properties.description: Famous for its stone Buddha and 13-story stone tower.

properties.name: Temple of Ly Kings (Den Do)
properties.description: Honors eight Ly dynasty kings; rich in architecture and history.

properties.name: Phat Tich Pagoda
properties.description: Houses Vietnam’s oldest stone Buddha statue; scenic mountain view.

properties.name: Lim Festival Site
properties.description: Annual Quan ho folk singing festival; vibrant cultural experience.

properties.name: Dong Ho Village
properties.description: Famous for Dong Ho folk paintings; traditional art workshops.

properties.name: Bac Ninh Quan Ho Folk Song Theatre
properties.description: The Bac Ninh Quan Ho Folk Song Theatre performs Quan Ho folk art programs for the public and tourists, contributing to the preservation and promotion of the value of this UNESCO intangible cultural heritage. The theatre also organizes many other major cultural events

properties.name: Bac Ninh Museum
properties.address: Nguyen Van Cu, Bac Ninh City
properties.description: Exhibits on history, archaeology, and folk culture of the region.

properties.name: Luy Lau Citadel
properties.description: Ancient citadel from Han dynasty era; archaeological significance.

properties.name: Dam Pagoda (Thần Quang Tự)
properties.address: Tự Thôn, Nam Sơn, Bac Ninh City
properties.description: Built in 1086 by Lý Nhân Tông; once a grand Buddhist center, now a historic ruin on Dạm Mountain.

properties.name: Vinh Nghiem Pagoda (Duc La)
properties.address: Duc La Village, Tri Yen, Yen Dung, Bac Giang
properties.description: 13th-century pagoda; cradle of Truc Lam Zen Buddhism; houses UNESCO-listed woodblocks.

properties.name: Tay Yen Tu Spiritual-Eco Site
properties.address: Tay Yen Tu Town, Son Dong, Bac Giang
properties.description: Final stop on Truc Lam Zen pilgrimage route; combines nature and spirituality in Yen Tu range.

properties.name: Khe Ro Lake Ecotourism Site
properties.address: An Lac, Son Dong, Bac Giang
properties.description: Pristine forest and lake within Tay Yen Tu Nature Reserve; ideal for healing and trekking.

properties.name: Bo Da Pagoda
properties.address: Tien Son, Viet Yen, Bac Giang
properties.description: Unique soil-walled pagoda with 100 ancient rooms and tower garden; Truc Lam Zen heritage.

properties.name: Kinh Duong Vuong Temple
properties.address: A Lu Village, Dai Dong Thanh, Thuan Thanh, Bac Ninh
properties.description: National relic honoring Vietnam’s legendary ancestor; tomb and temple complex by Duong River.

properties.name: Phu Lang Pottery Village
properties.address: Phu Lang, Que Vo, Bac Ninh
properties.description: 13th-century ceramic village by Cau River; known for wood-fired red clay pottery.
